title: "[22:28:27] 无法召唤实体"这种错误一般是这么导致的？
author: lxc0123

replies.author: Helewo
replies.txt_content:
喂喂喂！就是PigZombie好不！那就是僵尸猪人英文名，关键在于坐标上，正确指令：
summon PigZombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"勇士",Anger:32767,Equipment:[{id:wooden_sword,Count:1},{id:leather_chestplate,Count:1},{id:leather_chestplate,Count:1},{id:leather_leggings,Count:1},{id:leather_helmet,Count:1}],DropChances:[0F,0F,0F,0F,0F],Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:5},{Name:generic.followRange,Base:20},{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:30},{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:0.38}]}复制代码
对了，不仅是坐标，UUID也错了，反正我删除了= =
图片：

你要的= =

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: iceer
replies.txt_content:
我试过召唤闪电前几次都成功了后几次说什么【无法召唤实体】
指令如下/summon LightningBolt X Y Z [xyz坐标都有填，不要在意。]
然后他说无法召唤实体，我的闪电打错了吗
